title: Adrenoleukodystrophy: survey of 303 cases
abstract: Adrenoleukodystrophy (ALD) is a genetically determined disorder associated with progressive central demyelination and adrenal cortical insufficiency. We studied 303 patients to analyze phenotypic variation and outcomes.

title: Endoscopy reveals ventricular tachycardia secrets
abstract: Research question: How does metformin affect cancer through pituitary adenoma mechanisms? Methods: randomized controlled study with 53 elderly patients, assessing encephalitis and aphasia. Results: significant improvement in primary endpoints.

title: Dementia and cholecystitis: organ interplay
abstract: This study investigates the connection between dementia and cholecystitis in elderly patients. Clinical and biochemical markers were analyzed to determine correlation and treatment strategies.

title: Cardiovascular risk in diabetic patients
abstract: A cohort study was performed to evaluate cardiovascular risk factors in diabetic patients. Blood pressure, cholesterol levels, and lifestyle factors were recorded over 5 years.

title: Hepatorenal syndrome progression
abstract: This research examines the progression of hepatorenal syndrome in patients with advanced liver disease. Biomarkers and renal function tests were monitored to predict outcomes.
